overview_of_class: This course covers advanced concepts in physical chemistry of the climate system and geochemical environments, emphasizes critical reading of the current subject literature, and focuses on formulating scientific hypotheses and proposals that are then evaluated and ranked in peer-to-peer based mock grant review panels following NSF merit review criteria.
name: Environmental Chemistry
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Auditing not permitted

Prerequisites apply, see description
subject: CHEM
